LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Survive.label: <color=#97fefe>AGBs-IceFox</color>
LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Survive.description:
AGBs41，IceFox，It's one of the favorite Sydaily crystal weapons of the Ferian: Elegant design, small and lightweight at the same time to ensure that the effective killing of alien monsters！ 

This type of Sydaily crystal weapon is specially designed for Ferians who love to explore the unknown world. Most of the restrictions have been removed or lowered in response to the difficulties that might arise in alien exploration！ 

 1-Reduced the range limit for the "IceFox". 
 2-Removed the power limit on the "IceFox". 
(further limit the range of fire to avoid being torn apart.) 
 3-Built-in Sydaily Crystal Computer. 
 4-Sydaily Blade is now [on]. 


【Sydaily weapons never hurt Sydaily Race.】
